overview: To celebrate their tenth anniversary, and as the final episode in the METAL RESISTANCE, BABYMETAL performed ten shows at the iconic Nippon Budokan. This concert video is taken from the third and fourth of these shows.  01. IN THE NAME OF  02. Distortion (feat. Alissa White-Gluz)  03. PA PA YA!! (feat. F.HERO)  04. Gimme Chocolate!!  05. Doki Doki â˜† Morning  06. Syncopation  07. Megitsune  08. KARATE  09. From Dusk Till Dawn  10. Headbangeeeeerrrrr!!!!!  11. Road of Resistance  12. THE ONE  13. Ijime, Dame, Zettai
title: 10 BABYMETAL BUDOKAN - DOOMSDAY III & IV
